description:
As an Optimization Operations and Partner Relations Manager, you will work closely with customer and partner facing teams to build an excellent partner support experience across all partner types and their customers. You will work closely with Hardware Customer Care teams and our partner teams to onboard and develop partners to deliver fully-managed support services to customers. You will handle sensitive partner escalations by combining business judgment with effective technical assessment skills. Additionally, you will be the voice of the partner within the Hardware Customer Care organization to help identify key trends in partner and customer needs.

In this role, you will lead global projects to provide optimization solutions that will result in operational and customer experience enhancements and products and services improvements within Customer Care. You will work closely with partners and internal team members to identify partner and customer needs and expectations and develop solutions.

Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our Hardware team researches, designs, and develops new technologies and hardware to make our user's interaction with computing faster, more powerful, and seamless. Whether finding new ways to capture and sense the world around us, advancing form factors, or improving interaction methods, our Hardware team is making people's lives better through technology.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree or equivalent practical experience.
  • 7 years of experience working within Sales Operations and Enablement, Customer Support, Product Management, Partner Management, or other customer-centric global function.
  • Experience working cross-functionally and managing partnerships or projects.
  • Experience in people management and the service industry.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA degree or Master’s degree.
  • Ability to effectively influence and communicate cross-functionally with internal and external partners.
  • Ability to interact with diverse technical and non-technical groups, across organizational levels. Ability to work well in ambiguity and a fast-changing environment.
  • Ability to execute in a customer focused environment and advocate for partners and customers in a cross-functional organization.
  • Ability to work through operational complexity, identify key drivers for inefficiency in the systems/processes, and expeditiously solve them.
  • Excellent business judgment, problem-solving, presentation, and communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Onboard new partners, coordinate ongoing training, and manage certifications adherence for partners to grow their Google Devices and Services Support practices and increase their ability to handle support. Manage and monitor the support quality provided by the partner to their customers.
  • Conduct regular business reviews to evaluate and assess existing partner’s competencies along with key trends in customer needs. Engage with clients on best-practices and optimization opportunities.
  • Resolve high-profile escalations and challenges, improve the customer experience, and drive initiatives that increase our partnerns likelihood of success.
  • Set and manage operating review governance and cadence and ensure initiatives are rolled out effectively to the team.
  • Define processes that will eliminate inefficiencies/waste in the optimization processes and/or enhance the customer experience. Review existing optimization processes and techniques and identify inefficiencies in optimization practices.
title: Optimization Operations and Partner Relations Manager, Customer Care
